DOC.brief_summary: A Multicenter , Randomized , Double-blind , Active-controlled , Parallel Phase III
DOC.brief_title: A Multicenter , Double-blind , Parallel Phase III Study
DOC.detailed_description: A Multicenter , Randomized , Double-blind , Active-controlled , Parallel Phase III Study Investigate Efficacy ( Immunogenicity ) Safety GC3110A ( Quadrivalent Influenza Vaccine ) After Intramuscular Administration Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Criteria : Given write informed consent Healthy Korean adult ( age : 19 ) Korean adult agree 21 day follow vaccination good compliance study procedure Those able comply requirement study Inability written/verbal communication Subjects participate interventional study within 30 day Alcohol drug abuse within 6 month Who get treatment psychotropic drug narcotic analgesic drug within 6 month enrollment Disorders immune function History GuillainBarré syndrome Disease/medications likely cause severe bleed Active infection experience fever ( > 38.0 ℃ ) within 72 hour follow vaccination Oral temperature > 38.0 ℃ vaccination day Erythema , tattoo , injury shoulder ( vaccination site ) Hypersensitivity egg , chicken , vaccine component , Neomycin , Gentamicin Influenza vaccination within 6months Any vaccination within 30 day Concomitant medications/therapy immunosuppressant immune modify drug , systemic corticosteroid , immunoglobulin , blood blood derive product , anticancer chemotherapy radiation therapy within3 month Pregnant breastfeed woman Clinically significant underlying disease medical history investigator 's discretion
